channel.title: Please Help?!?!?!? :(
channel.description:
Ok, I have had this problem a while now and I am sick of it... Any help will be apreciated.
Problem:
Compiling. My compilers always ask for a path for example: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe
I've looked in all java folders there is no "javac.exe"
When I install the new JDK I have a "javac.exe" and it compiles fine, but everytime I try to play runescape my computer goes into sleep mode and I can't wake it up.
Does anyone know of a way i can make a 508 server compile without needing the new JDK, or does anyone know how to stop my sleep mode troubles.
THANKS FOR ANY HELP YOU CAN GIVE.

item.title: Please Help?!?!?!? :(
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

try this @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.description:

umm ok ty ill give it a whirl (y)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2009, 12:14:20 pm[/size][hr]didnt work its not the jdk1.6.0_07 bit its the “javac.exe” bit… its missing… :S cud anyone tell me the contents of javac.exe if u open in notepad maybe I could make it my self…? :S

item.title: Please Help?!?!?!? :(
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Ok, I have had this problem a while now and I am sick of it... Any help will be apreciated.

Problem:

Compiling. My compilers always ask for a path for example: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe

I’ve looked in all java folders there is no “javac.exe”

When I install the new JDK I have a “javac.exe” and it compiles fine, but everytime I try to play runescape my computer goes into sleep mode and I can’t wake it up.

Does anyone know of a way i can make a 508 server compile without needing the new JDK, or does anyone know how to stop my sleep mode troubles.

THANKS FOR ANY HELP YOU CAN GIVE.

edit the jdk1.6.0_07 to match your version of java… the 07 is the update… if it where jdk 6 update 11 it would be jdk1.6.0_11.
hope that helps.

Read full topic
